version_description: This release introduces exciting new features for our merchant partners. Update now and experience the power of UPI!
This release introduces exciting new features for our merchant partners. Update now and experience the power of UPI!

Everything! Its like we're re-born:

- Get loan upto Rs.5,00,000 in minutes
- Pay in easy daily instalments (EDIs)
- Invest your QR money in BharatPe Interest A/c & EARN 12%* (yes, its true)
- Wait wait wait, it gets better. Spend this money seamlessly on Shops, Online or ATMs using the BharatPe XtraIncome Card
- Also get get 1%* EXTRA Cashback on every card spend
- Record all your Sales (be it Udhaar or Cash) using the "Khata"
- Keep track of all payables to your Suppliers by uploading all your purchase bills in the Invoices section
- Buy Life, Shop, HospiCash & other Insurance products directly thru the app
- And everybody's favourite - Bug fixes & under the hood enhancements

Hurry, update the app now!
